name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】白上フブキ生誕祭2024　#FBKINGDOMPROLOGUE【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ 】 [-a68MSMFuuM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Opening scene transition with a castle in the background.
Transition effect with bright white light.
Beginning of the performance for 'Inochi no Justitia'.

subtitles.original: さあさあこの指にとまれ
subtitles.english: Come on, come on, stop at this finger

subtitles.original: 後悔後でしても知らないぞ
subtitles.english: Don't blame me if you regret it later

subtitles.original: 音に呑まれて　歌って踊って満たすだけ
subtitles.english: Just get swallowed by the sound, sing, dance, and satisfy yourself

subtitles.original: パンパン手を打ち鳴らして
subtitles.english: Clap, clap, sound out your hands

subtitles.original: ソッソッソラシドどんな五線譜も
subtitles.english: So, so, so-la-si-do, no matter the staff

subtitles.original: 音色を落として　今導き出すよ
subtitles.english: Drop the timbre and I'll lead the way now

subtitles.original: 正体は実は案外はがゆいもの
subtitles.english: The true identity is actually surprisingly frustrating

subtitles.original: 魔法のタクト空に翳すだけ
subtitles.english: Just hold the magic baton up to the sky

subtitles.original: おいであ
subtitles.english: Come here

subtitles.original: 街を包み込んだ超常現象が
subtitles.english: The paranormal phenomenon that enveloped the city

subtitles.original: 夜空に、ほらこだまして退屈が泣き出す
subtitles.english: Is echoing in the night sky, look, boredom starts to cry

subtitles.original: 孤独な愛を埋めよう最終妄想的ノクターンが
subtitles.english: Let's fill the lonely love, the final delusional nocturne

subtitles.original: 君は聞こえた？星に舞う旋律を
subtitles.english: Did you hear it? The melody dancing in the stars

subtitles.original: ワンツースリーしで泣いてた過去に負けない巡る力を
subtitles.english: One-two-three-four, the power that goes around, not losing to the past that was crying

subtitles.original: 楽しいリズムで途切れない音を乗せて
subtitles.english: With a fun rhythm, carry the non-stop sound

subtitles.original: タッタッ
subtitles.english: Tattan

subtitles.original: アイダイを描こうセプテット
subtitles.english: Let's draw 'Idai', Septet

subtitles.original: 忘れてた景色の向こうのその向こう
subtitles.english: Beyond the scenery you forgot, and even further

subtitles.original: 見て調和の綻び
subtitles.english: Look at the rift in harmony

subtitles.original: モノクロの望遠鏡
subtitles.english: A monochrome telescope

subtitles.original: 待ったなしのぶっつけ本番で
subtitles.english: No waiting, straight into the real performance

subtitles.original: 奏でよう
subtitles.english: Let's play

subtitles.original: 理想輝く幻想的進行で
subtitles.english: With a fantastic progression where ideals shine

subtitles.original: いつも目が合うアイツと手を繋ぎ踊ろう
subtitles.english: Let's hold hands and dance with that person who I always lock eyes with

subtitles.original: 何度も泣いて描いた心のエレジーを
subtitles.english: The elegy of the heart drawn after crying many times

subtitles.original: 僕は聞こえただから今ここにいるんだ
subtitles.english: I heard it, that's why I'm here now

subtitles.original: 正体は実は案外悲しいもの
subtitles.english: The true identity is actually surprisingly sad

subtitles.original: 魔法の音色空に響かせて
subtitles.english: Make the magic timbre resound in the sky

subtitles.original: おいでよ
subtitles.english: Come here

subtitles.original: 街を包み込んだ超常現象が
subtitles.english: The paranormal phenomenon that enveloped the city

subtitles.original: 夜空に、ほらこだまして退屈が泣き出す
subtitles.english: Is echoing in the night sky, look, boredom starts to cry

subtitles.original: 愉快な歌を歌おう最終演奏アンサンブルを
subtitles.english: Let's sing a pleasant song, the final performance ensemble

subtitles.original: 君は聞こえた？星に舞う旋律を
subtitles.english: Did you hear it? The melody dancing in the stars

subtitles.original: ワンツースリーしで泣いて過去に負けない巡る力を
subtitles.english: One-two-three-four, crying, the power that goes around, not losing to the past

subtitles.original: 楽しいリズムで途切れない音に乗せて
subtitles.english: With a fun rhythm, carry the non-stop sound

subtitles.original: タッタッ
subtitles.english: Tattan

subtitles.original: パンパン手を打ち鳴らして
subtitles.english: Clap, clap, sound out your hands

subtitles.original: 踊れ踊れオーケストラ
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, orchestra

subtitles.original: バイバイ今夜はさよなら
subtitles.english: Bye-bye, tonight is farewell

subtitles.original: 次は君もステージで
subtitles.english: Next time, you'll be on stage too

subtitles.original: タッタッ
subtitles.english: Tattan

subtitles.original: さあさあこの指にとまれ
subtitles.english: Come on, come on, stop at this finger

subtitles.original: 後悔後でしても知らないぞ
subtitles.english: Don't blame me if you regret it later

subtitles.original: 耳をすまして僕らと踊るだけ
subtitles.english: Just listen closely and dance with us

subtitles.original: Justice is still in my heart
subtitles.english: Justice is still in my heart

subtitles.original: 君に届けユースティティア
subtitles.english: Reaching out to you, Justitia

subtitles.original: 暗闇が立ち込めた様な　見捨てられた街で
subtitles.english: In a deserted city that seemed to be shrouded in darkness
